did.unittitle: Pennsylvania Governor's Commission to Revise the Public Employee Law of Pennsylvania Statements, Hearings, Minutes, and Stenographic Reports of Public Hearings

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Pennsylvania. Governor's Commission to Revise the Public Employee Law

did.abstract: The collection contains Hickman Commission Statements; Pennsylvania Governor's Commission Hearings; Minutes of the Commission; and Stenographic Reports of Public Hearings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains Hickman Commission Statements; Pennsylvania Governor's Commission Hearings; Minutes of the Commission; and Stenographic Reports of Public Hearings.
Senate Bill no. 355, no. 518, no. 1021 ; House Bill no. 1443 ; Public Employees Relations Bills are all included in this collection.
4. Stenographic Reports of Public Hearings: Sen. Bill #355, #518, #1021 (originals and mf), House Bill #1443 (originals and mf)-Public Employees Relations Bill.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Pennsylvania Governor's Commission to Revise the Public Employee Law of Pennsylvania Statements, Hearings, Minutes, and Stenographic Reports of Public Hearings #5199. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
